75196.summary: Some customers in the Glenbrooke North area of New Westminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
75196.title: Apr 11 - New Westminster (Glenbrooke North) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
